message: "There's no way to know without investigation whether a place is legitimate, or if someone is a trafficking victim in any individual case, [but] absolutely, a lot of them have been abused and deceived."

data.description: March 8 is U.N.-designated International Women’s Day, which has roots in the fight for better and safer working conditions in the U.S. This year, many global corporations are marking the day with events celebrating women’s education and parity in the workplace.
data.title: Stand up for powerless women: Advocates for sex trafficking victims are few and far between
